channel.title: How do i make item give players donator rank?
channel.description: i was wondering if some one can tell me how i can make something like a lamp give you donator rank when you use it?

item.title: How do i make item give players donator rank?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

Clickitem.java
Find this: if(itemId == 6796) { c.playerLevel[0] = 99; c.playerLevel[2] = 99; c.playerLevel[3] = 99; c.playerLevel[4] = 99; c.playerLevel[6] = 99; c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.playerXP[2] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.playerXP[4] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.playerXP[6] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(0); c.getPA().refreshSkill(2); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); c.getPA().refreshSkill(4); c.getPA().refreshSkill(6); c.getItems().deleteItem(6796, 1); c.logout(); }
Under it add:

if (itemId == lampidhere) {//Donor Lamp c.isDonator = 1; c.playerRights = 4; c.logout(); }
Post any errors
Iâ€™m assuming your using PI.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make item give players donator rank?
